exercise.question: I don't think horoscopes are detailed enough.
I think horoscopes are boring.
People can usually recognize something about themselves in a horoscope.
Some people I know take horoscopes very seriously.
Sometimes you hope that your horoscope doesn't come true.

script.line: I'm Aquarius. No, not usually, although now and again, if I'm bored. I mean there does (do) seem to be certain traits that maybe fit in, but I just think it's too too ambiguous, too vague to be specific. I don't think there's (there are) 12 types of personality.
Virgo. Once in a while, yeah. Hope that it comes true sometimes and other times kind of avoid it. I think it can, yeah.
Libra, Libra, the scales. Sometimes, just for a laugh, that's all. Not personally, I don't, but I do know people do believe in it religiously. But not personally, no.
I'm a Pisces. Occasionally, occasionally. Yes, I think if you read your horoscopes, you can always find something in there that relates to you, so I think you can believe that.
